name: relayd
description: Remote control interface for Codex agents, allowing developers to manage and ship code from anywhere.

name: Coderrr
description: Open source CLI-first AI coding companion for terminal-based development workflows.

name: flins
description: Universal skill and command manager for AI coding tools, integrating various coding assistants.

name: Phoenix CLI
description: Command-line interface for retrieving trace data from Phoenix, enabling AI coding assistants to access observability data through terminal and file interfaces.

name: 1Code
description: Open source Cursor-like UI for Claude Code, providing a visual interface for AI-assisted coding.

name: Knowns CLI
description: AI-first CLI for task management and documentation that links docs in tasks and reads context automatically to avoid repeating patterns.

name: Cowork
description: Turns Claude into your digital coworker for collaborative development tasks.

name: WebTerm
description: Browser terminal sandbox for learning CLI without fear, emphasizing CLI literacy for engineers and non-engineers in the AI era.
